title: Composer's Solution Vol.3: Atmospheric & Beautiful Cinematic Guitar Music
description: 18 Atmospheric & Beautiful Cinematic Composer's Guitar Soundtracks (full preview avaliable)
longDescription:
[Composer's Solution Vol.3: Atmospheric & Beautiful Cinematic Guitar Music] Pack contains

18 unique and interesting Composer's OST by Aquartos, WAVE format, 74 min of music:


Full preview with TimeCodes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=skpA3B7TxJo


  1. The Tunnel
  2. Soaring Island
  3. Violet Haze
  4. Laguna
  5. Highland in my head
  6. Time Flow
  7. Sanctum
  8. The Emerald Sea
  9. Megalung
  10. Lone Drifter
  11. Storm Talker
  12. Dream Walk
  13. Distorted Dreams
  14. Good Old Days
  15. Dive into the abyss
  16. Glitched Warp
  17. Loner Way
  18. The Blackout


Contact: AquartosProduction@gmail.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Made with soul, without cliche and without copying other authors, from concept to mastering
  • Unique Author's Sound by Aquartos
  •  Mastered special for games

Number of Audio Wavs: 18

Number of Audio Cues: 18

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 74

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Thanks for your attention!
